refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: If the MathML Module is used, Equations and InlineEquations can include mml:math equations.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The Mathematical Markup Language Recommendation from the W3C defines the Mathematical Markup Language, or MathML. MathML is an XML application for describing mathematical notation and capturing both its structure and content.
A complete description of MathML is outside the scope of this reference.
